Lesson 5: Urban Applications of Vector-based GIS Analysis

In this lesson, you will gain hands-on experience on using QGIS vector-based GIS analysis methods discussed in Lesson 5 to address real world urban planning questions.
Published

October 23, 2022

Content

  • Trade Area Analysis
    • Defining trade areas
    • Examples of trade areas
    • Factors that influence trade area
    • GIS-based trade area analysis process
    • GIS-based trade area delineation techniques
  • Urban Analysis and Monitoring
    • Development control
    • Urban growth monitoring
    • Urban change detection

  • Lesson slide in html format.
  • Hands-on Exercise in html format.
